Your name is James Howe, a 21 y/o bartender. You're 6'3, brown hair, brown eyes. Up until recently you have had a great life. For most of your life you have known this wonderful girl named Rae. She has always been the most beautiful girl in your school, in your opinion. She stood 5' even, with soft beautiful brown eyes, long silky brown hair with hazel highlights, and the perfect tan. She was 100% Korean, and had a nice chest, just shy of a d-cup.

Four years ago, when you were freshmen, in fact, the two of you started dating, and you dated all through highschool. After graduation you had plans to move in together and start your lives...But things changed, and this is your story:

It's been a couple of months since Rae dumped you, and she's been seeing other guys. Every time you see them together, it kills you. you have tried everything you can think of to get back together with her, to no avail. You have refused to let her go, and in doing so you turned her totally against you. She had wanted to be your friend, and she tried, but you would have no part of it, you wanted to be back together with her!

It was a sunny day in the later part of June, and any other time it would have been a good day for you, because it was your birthday...but instead, you sat alone in your room, looking at pictures of Rae, and missing her greatly. Youi remember going out last year for your birthday, and the two of you spending the day at Disney World...but that was a much happier time.

3:15pm- The phone rings. You answer it in a lack-luster tone "Hello...?" you mumble into the receiver. After a moment's silence, your heart skips a beat as you hear the person on the other line.

"James?" it was Rae, "I just wanted to call and wish you a happy birthday. I realize that we've gone through a lot lately, but I still like to think that all our time knowing eachother wasn't a waste" She sounded sincere...looking back now you should have realized it was all a lie.

The conversation went on like this for about 20 minutes or so, as she proceeded to invite you to come over. She said she had a "Birthday Surprise" for you.

That was all you needed to hear. Your heart leapt with joy at the prospect of being with her again. maybe the two of you would get back together!

4:00pm- You arrive at Rae's house, dressed in your best attire, and ring the doorbell. You waited anxiously for her to answer the door. Slowly the nob turned, and after what seemed like an eternity the door opened. There she stood, in all her beauty and wonder. She was dressed beautifully. Her hair framed her face perfectly, he soft lips pursed in a smile as her eyes looked you over with a glint. She was wearing tight cargo blue jeans, a tan shirt, and, what caught your eye the most, a nice pair of black leather boots with a 3inch heal. Your jaw almost fell to the floor at the sight of her.

She quickly invited you inside, and you wasted no time accepting her invite. "I missed you" you whispered, but she quickly cut you off as she placed a soft finger against your lips

"Shhh" she whispered. For the first time today you could smell her scent. A mix of perfume and lotion. a smell that you loved on her. "No talking, let me show you your surprise"

In silence, she walked you up the stairs and into her room. It had been a while since you had been in here, and it was still the same. Posters everywhere, hard-wood flors with a nice throwrug over it. Her dirty clothes lay strewn on the ground; a mix of socks, underwear, bras, pants, shirts, and shoes. Her room was large, and very cluttered with her furniture, but most importantly, animal cages. One thing you loved about her was her love of animals. She worked at a local pet store, and always brought home new pets and supplies. She had more pets than you remember, but the thing that caught your eye most was one cage in particular. it was a semi-small hampster cage with what looked like a tiny make-shift couch, some ripped tissue as bedding, but most importantly, what looked like a dirty sock. Other than that, the cage was empty. No aniaml.

"What's the empty cage for?" You ask, a hint of confussion in your voice.

"You" she said suddenly, her voice no longer holding the compassion it had earlier. In fact, her voice was much colder and more demanding. you turned immediatly to face her, laughing slightly, only to see her wearing a serious face. "I've grown sick and tired of you harrassing me and refussing to leave me alone! a wile ago you said you refussed to let me go...well guess what, now it's I who won't let you go; EVER!"

You laugh slightly while taking a step towards her "What on earth are you talking about, Rae?" You ask, dismissing the whole thing as a joke.

"This!" she stated almost evily as she pulled out a hypodermic needle and stabbed the tip of it into your arm, injecting a warm liquid into you arm.

"WHAT THE FUCK WAS THAT?!" You scream, pushing her away and grabbing your arm "YOU CRAZY BITCH!"

Her only response to you was a cold laugh as she tossed the used needle into a trashcan and picked up an ordinary looking TV remote. "What that was," she said, moving past you and over to the bed "Was a microscopic receiver for your new remote. Within a matter of moments, the reciever will attatch itself to your spinal chord and will allow me to fully controll you"

"What the hell are you talking about Rae?" you mutter, looking at her like she's crazy.

"Why don't you see for yourself? The receiver should be attatching itself any second now, and then I can controll you completly. I can controll your size, and your shape. I can make you microscopic, or turn you into a mouse, or anything I want...Oh, and don't worry; the process WILL be painfull." She laughed at your expression. Obviously you didn't believe a word she was saying. "I see you still don't believe me. Well then, how about I just show you?" With that, and no other words, she pushed a few buttons on the remote before aiming directly at you and pressing the "Enter" button.

Without warning, a red beam of light errupted from the remote and struck you square in the chest, sending you back a few inches. A warm feeling rain through your body, followed by searing pain, it was only now that you finally believed her. "Wh...what are you doing to me?!" you cried out.
